column4: I cant login anymore with my default account. I tried deleting a bunch of the default gnome hidden files but than makes no diff. what do I do!?
can you choose the "failsafe" session? (maybe the name is a bit different from "failsafe", you need to check that)
you should never delete files without backing them up, if you do not know for sure how to either resurrect, recreate them or that they are irrelevant
